decision_conditions: The development to which this permission relates shall be begun not later than the expiration of three years from the date of this permission.

Reason: To comply with Section 91 of the Town & Country Planning Act 1990. | The development hereby approved shall be carried out in accordance with drawing / document title number(s): PLANNING (HOUSEHOLDER) CONSENT APPLICATION DATED 10 OCTOBER 2023 - DESIGN & ACCESS STATEMENT; 2311-P/L&S/01 Planning Submission Drawing - Location & Site Plans; 2311-P/EX/01 Planning Submission Drawing - Existing Front Elevation; 2311-P/EX/02 Planning Submission Drawing - Existing Side Elevations; 2311-P/EX/03 Planning Submission Drawing - Existing Rear Elevation; 2311-P/P/01 Planning Submission Drawing - Proposed Front Elevation; 2311-P/P/02 Planning Submission Drawing - Proposed Side Elevations; 2311-P/P/03 Planning Submission Drawing - Proposed Rear Elevation; 2311-P/W-G/01 Planning Submission Drawing - Window Schedule - Ground Floor; 2311-P/W-F/01 Planning Submission Drawing - Window Schedule - First Floor; 2311-P/DL-W/01 Planning Submission Drawing - Cross Section Details of New Window Assemblies GW1 to 5 & FW1 to 8-Double Glazed; 2311-P/DL-D/01 Planning Submission Drawing - Cross Section Details of New External Door Assemblies ED1 & ED2 -Double Glazed
Reason: For the avoidance of doubt, and in the interests of proper planning.
| All external materials to be used in the development shall match the appearance of those of the existing building, unless otherwise stated in the submitted application form or approved drawings.

Reason: To ensure that the materials harmonise with the surroundings, in accordance with policies 1.1 & 1.2 of the Ealing Core Strategy (2012), policies 7.4 & 7B of the Ealing Development Management Development Plan Document (2013), policies D3 and D4 of the London Plan (2021) and the National Planning Policy Framework (2023).
description: Replacement of windows timber painted  single glazed with timber painted  double glazed windows; replacement of external doors from timber painted glazed to timber painted glazed
